name: Spellbreaker
description: You can strike at enemy spellcasters who fail to cast defensively when you threaten them.
benefit: Enemies in your threatened area that fail their checks to cast spells defensively provoke attacks of opportunity from you.
normal: Enemies that fail to cast spells defensively do not provoke attacks of opportunity.
staminaText: When you hit a caster with an attack of opportunity it provoked by failing to cast defensively, you can spend 5 stamina points to daze the caster until the end of its next turn. If the caster succeeds at a Fortitude save with a DC equal to 10 + your base attack bonus, it is staggered instead.
mythicBenefit: Any non-mythic creature you threaten provokes an attack of opportunity from you whenever it uses a spell or spell-like ability, even when casting defensively or casting a quickened spell.
description_zh: 当你威胁到敌人的施法者时，如果他们防御施法失败，你能够对他们进行攻击。
benefit_zh: 在你威胁范围内防御施法检定失败的敌人会触发你的藉机攻击。
